data.text:
Fun Facts about Michael Jordan for Kids

Discover fast, interesting fun facts about the famous basketball hero Michael Jordan. Kids will discover some amazing, cool and quick information about this successful American male athlete whose sporting career and outstanding achievements has made him famous across the world! Michael Jordan is a famous American basketball player who is known by various nicknames including MJ, Air Jordan and Black Cat.

Check out our facts and information below to discover interesting details about the records and achievements of Michael Jordan. Learn new facts including who he is married to? How many kids he has, where he studied and what type of accident prevented him from playing more than 60 games!
